description: Detects suspicious processes based on name and location that access the browser credential stores which can be the sign of credential stealing Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Browser Credential Store Access
query: (file.path:(*\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\UserData\\Default\\Network\\Cookies OR *\\Appdata\\Local\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Default\\Login\ Data OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\UserData\\LocalState OR *\\Appdata\\Local\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WebCache\\WebCacheV01.dat OR *\\cookies.sqlite) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*\\firefox.exe OR *\\chrome.exe)) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable:(*\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\MpCopyAccelerator.exe)) OR (process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe" AND file.path:*\\APPDATA\\LOCAL\\MICROSOFT\\WINDOWS\\WEBCACHE\\WEBCACHEV01.DAT))))
